mapper.insert: insert into cart (userId, productId, count) values (#{userId}, #{productId}, #{count})

insert into order_tbl(orderId, userId, orderRec, postCode, roadAddress, detailAddress, orderPhone, total, orderDate) values ( #{orderId}, #{userId}, #{orderRec}, #{postCode}, #{roadAddress}, #{detailAddress}, #{orderPhone}, #{total}, now())
insert into order_detail_tbl(orderId, productId, count) values (#{orderId}, #{productId}, #{count});
mapper.select: select productId, productName, price, #{count} as count from product where productId = #{productId}
mapper.delete: delete from cart where userId = #{userId} and productId = #{productId}
mapper.select: select * from order_tbl order by orderDate desc

select O.*, D.orderDetailNum, D.productId, D.count, P.productName, P.price from order_tbl O inner join order_detail_tbl D on O.orderId = D.orderId inner join product P on D.productId = P.productId where O.orderId = #{orderId}
mapper.update: update order_tbl set delivery = #{delivery} where orderId = #{orderId}
update product set stock = stock - #{stock} where productId = #{productId}
mapper.select: select orderId, productId, count from order_detail_tbl where orderId = #{orderId}
